preqs: Chinese introductory 2 or equivalent or permission

rules.ruleString: (Must have passed a unit in {CHI%020, CHI%030, CHI%040, CHI%050, CHI%060, CHI%070, CHI%080, CHI%090, CHI%100, CHI%110, CHI%120, CHI%902, CHI%903, CHI%904, CHI%905, CHI%906, CHI%907, CHI%908, CHI%909, CHI%910, CHI%911, CHI%912, CHI1220} OR  Permission required)
(Must have passed a unit in {ATS1002, ATS2002} or  Permission required)

Must have passed an (I/W) unit in {ATS1002, ATS1003, ATS1004, ATS1005, ATS1006, ATS1007, ATS1008, ATS1009, ATS1010, ATS1011, ATS1012, ATS1022, ATS1023, ATS1024, ATS1025, ATS1026, ATS1027, ATS1028, ATS1029, ATS1030, ATS1031, ATS1032, ATS2002, ATS2003, ATS2004, ATS2005, ATS2006, ATS2007, ATS2008, ATS2009, ATS2010, ATS2011, ATS2012, ATS2022, ATS2023, ATS2024, ATS2025, ATS2026, ATS2027, ATS2028, ATS2029, ATS2030, ATS2031, ATS2032, ATS3005, ATS3006, ATS3007, ATS3008, ATS3009, ATS3010, ATS3011, ATS3012, ATS3023, ATS3024, ATS3025, ATS3026, ATS3027, ATS3028, ATS3029, ATS3030, ATS3031, ATS3032}
Must have passed 1 (I/W) units in {ATS1002, ATS2002}

description: The unit introduces students to perspectives on contemporary Chinese culture and society as presented in academic publications, social commentary, media reports and on the Chinese Internet. It  covers  key topics in cultural studies, politics and social studies, , as these are discussed and written about in English and Chinese. It examines and compares Chinese and Western views on contemporary issues in China.  Research methods and skills relevant to the study of contemporary China are an important feature of this unit.
